choose.when: SELECT areacode, step1 FROM tb_weather_area WHERE step2 = "" AND step3 = "" ORDER BY step1
SELECT areacode, step2 FROM tb_weather_area WHERE step1 = #{keyword} AND step3 = "" AND step2 != "" ORDER BY step2
SELECT areacode, step3 FROM tb_weather_area WHERE step2 = #{keyword} AND step3 != "" ORDER BY step3
